recipe.title: Turkey Paisano Sandwiches with Fig-and-Black Olive Vinaigrette
ingredients: 1 oz fig (or raspberry) preserves, slightly warmed
1 small clove garlic, peeled and minced
8 oz smoked turkey breast, thinly sliced
2 roasted red bell peppers, peeled, cut in half and seeded
instructions: Combine preserves, vinegar, oil, mustard, garlic, olives, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Spread onto top of split rolls. Layer remaining ingredients onto bottom of rolls.
